title.rendered: Grow & Scale Your Agency with Jason Swenk – 15-minute Session + Q&A

content.rendered:
[vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” content_placement=”bottom” css=”.vc_custom_1597242060346{border-bottom-width: 5px !important;padding-top: 130px !important;padding-bottom: 80px !important;background: #1e1e1f url(https://wp.static-cdn-shsp.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/AAS_Hero_Chip_R2.jpg?id=202332) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;border-bottom-color: #f5f5f5 !important;border-bottom-style: solid !important;}”][vc_column offset=”vc_col-lg-7 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-sm-offset-0 vc_col-xs-12″ css=”.vc_custom_1525274666229{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;padding-right: 10% !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”]

Grow & Scale Your Agency with Jason Swenk

[vc_text_separator title=”15-minute Session + Q&A” title_align=”separator_align_left” color=”custom” border_width=”2″ accent_color=”#84c340″ el_class=”speakers-divider” css=”.vc_custom_1598298976589{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 20px !important;padding-bottom: 20px !important;}”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1618843608574{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”]

Part of our Agency GROWTH Series

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_col-lg-5 vc_col-md-6 vc_hidden-sm vc_col-xs-12 vc_hidden-xs”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row content_placement=”top” css=”.vc_custom_1525275406838{padding-top: 2% !important;padding-bottom: 5% !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_col-lg-7 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-sm-offset-0 vc_col-xs-12″ css=”.vc_custom_1525275661232{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 20px !important;padding-right: 10% !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_column_text el_class=”list-unstyled list-chevron”]Would you like to grow your digital agency faster without working all the time? That’s Jason Swenk’s whole thing – teaching agency leaders how to grow and scale with more efficient systems. During a quick 15-minute lesson, he discusses how agency owners can grow by delegating day-to-day roles and leaning into what they love most. Then, Jason joins SharpSpring CMO Chip House for a live Q&A about systemizing business operations, reducing stress in the agency world and lots more!

Check out other free sessions like this one via our Agency Growth Series with other top influencers in digital marketing like Seth Godin, Ann Handley, Rand Fishkin, Shama Hyder and many more![/vc_column_text]

Hosts

Jason Swenk

Agency Advisor and Mentor

Jason literally wrote the book for growing an agency from nothing to an 8 figure business. He is one of the most sought out advisors to agencies in the world working with brands like AT&T, Hitachi, Lotus Cars, and eventually led to selling his agency. He hosts The Smart Agency Master Class Podcast, where he shares the strategies and stories from real agency owners, and SwenkToday, a show that shares the latest growth strategies and mindset for digital agency growth.read more...

Chip House

CMO, SharpSpring

Chip House is CMO at SharpSpring. A well-known executive in the email marketing industry, Chip has extensive experience with organizational development and go-to-market strategies in early- to mid-stage B2B SaaS companies. At SharpSpring, Chip drives strategy for the marketing team, leading content, lead generation, marketing operations and more.

[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_col-lg-5 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-xs-12″ css=”.vc_custom_1597245028583{margin-top: 0px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;}” el_class=”m-t-minus-35-percent”][vc_raw_html][/vc_raw_html][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column]

excerpt.rendered: During this session, agency growth expert and mentor Jason Swenk discusses how agency owners can grow and scale by using specific systematic methods, then joins SharpSpring CMO Chip House for a deep-dive Q&A.
